text: West Elsdon, one of the 77 official community areas. It is located on the southwest side of the City of Chicago, Illinois. It is known as a twin neighborhood of West Lawn. It has a population which includes a mix of Polish- American residents and increasing Mexican-American residents who have a clear majority. ==Other websites== *West Elsdon map & neighborhood guide on ExploreChicago.org *Official City of Chicago West Elsdon Community Map Category:Community areas of Chicago
title: West Elsdon, Chicago
